basics.name: Leon Chen
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: UBC Computer Science Bachelor 2025, Informatics Olympiad First Prize 2018,2019 in China, interested in ML/CV direction. Overworked student:)

work.name: University of Manitoba
work.summary: Conducted research on Graph Burning and the generalized Turán Number, collaborating with others to solve the Graph Burning adversary version problem. Used a greedy approach to solve the tree Turán number (maximum number of edges a graph can have without containing a particular subgraph).

education.institution: The University of British Columbia, Vancouver, Canada

awards.title: Dean's Honour List
awards.awarder: University of Manitoba Faculty of Science
awards.summary: Recognized on the Dean's Honour List for outstanding academic achievement.

awards.title: 2022 Undergraduate Research Award
awards.summary: Received the 2022 Undergraduate Research Award in recognition of outstanding research contributions.

awards.title: First Prize
awards.awarder: National Olympiad of Informatics in Province (NOIp), China Computer Foundation
awards.summary: Achieved First Prize in the National Olympiad of Informatics in Province (NOIp) in both Nov 2019 and Nov 2018.

projects.name: Quantum Computing
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
